title: Expired Cans of Salmon From Decades Ago Preserved a Huge Surprise
desc: Scientists have made some intriguing parasite discoveries in an accidental back-of-the-pantry natural history museum. Canned salmon, well past its prime, has preserved decades of Alaskan marine ecology in brine and tin.

title: Jay Shetty weighs in on New Year's resolution
desc: Jay Shetty is entering the new year with a renewed focus on realignment and living more intentionally.Speaking with PEOPLE Magazine, the author and life coach opened up about his New Year's...

title: Shavkat Rakhmonov expected to miss several more months after another surgery
desc: UFC welterweight Shavkat Rakhmonov’s octagon absense has been extended for several more months.

title: Ibrahima Konate on emotional goal against Newcastle
desc: "I'm very happy," said Ibrahima Konate after scoring an emotional goal to seal Liverpool's 4-1 win over Newcastle United.

title: Hugo Ekitike takes aim at Newcastle supporters after taunts over Liverpool transfer
desc: Hugo Ekitike earned plenty of plaudits for his performance in Liverpool's win over Newcastle United in the Premier League

title: Hugo Ekitike spotted trolling Newcastle fans at Anfield after starring in crucial Liverpool win
desc: Liverpool hero Hugo Ekitike was spotted winding Newcastle supporters up after scoring twice against them at Anfield

title: Woeful Australia sent spinning by Pakistan in T20 World Cup warm-up
desc: Australia’s T20 World Cup preparations have hit problems as Pakistan’s spinners bowled them to a chastening series defeat with a 90-run thrashing in Lahore

title: Venezuela's acting president proposes legislation that could lead to release of hundreds of political prisoners
desc: The U.S. Embassy for Venezuela also announced Friday that all American citizens detained in Venezuela have been released.

title: US judge orders Liam Conejo Ramos, 5, and father released from ICE detention
desc: A US judge orders a five-year-old boy and his father to be released from immigration detention after their arrest in Minnesota last month.

title: I Watched MELANIA
desc: David Farrier from Webworm watches and reviews MELANIA, directed by sex pest Brett Ratner, and funded by Jeff Bezos for $40 million
